```{r Setup_Libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(pander)
```

```{r get_Schedule}

wkly_sched <- read_csv("WeeklyMeetings.csv", col_types = cols(Date=col_date())) %>%
  rename(" " = "X5") %>%
  replace_na(list(Who = " ",Group = " ", 'Group A' = " ", 'Group B' = " ", 'Group C' = " ", ' ' = "|")) 

wkly_sched %>%
  pander(caption = "Weekly Schedule of Meetings for the Bioinformatics Hub", split.table = Inf)

```
